alert.note: Alert for Conway; Johnson; Logan; Pope; Van Buren; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:55PM CDT until May 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...SOUTHWESTERN JOHNSON...SOUTHWESTERN VAN BUREN...NORTH CENTRAL CONWAY...NORTH CENTRAL YELL AND SOUTHERN POPE COUNTIES... At 254 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jerusalem to 8 miles northwest of Danville to near Paris, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Paris... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... London... Subiaco... Hartman... Hector... Scranton... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Cleveland... Mt Nebo State Park... Mount Magazine... Lanty... Jerusalem... Lake Dardanelle... Midway in Logan County... Blick... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 75 and 90. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Johnson; Logan; Pope; Van Buren; Yell
